My name is Jamie, and I live in a large house.
My house has very big rooms.
We can hold big parties in the living room...
...and we have a kitchen filled with lots of food.
My bedroom has a very big closet with lots of shelves.
I also have an office, so I can work from home.
We have a nice swimming pool behind our house.
There are a lot of tables and chairs there.
There is also a garden with lots of plants and flowers.
Our garage is under the ground,...
...and we store our bikes and park our cars there.
